name: British Retail Consortium
membership: The BRC is a member of EuroCommerce, the European association for the wholesale and retail sectors.
goal: To make a positive difference for our members and to advance the interests of UK retailers with policy makers and stakeholders.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Public Health, Single market, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: All aspects of Single Market policy, but in particular policy issues relating to sales of goods and services to consumers.  All aspects of food policy but in particular issues relating to food information and labelling, nutrition and food safety.  International trade.  Environment and sustainability policy. Brexit.
